languages.text: "И что, прям по морде тебе заехало этим рычагом? Ха! Зубом больше, зубом меньше. Синяки, ожоги, порезы — это все пустое".

traits.locale_text: "И что, прям по морде тебе заехало этим рычагом? Ха-ха-хаха! Да ладно, зубом больше, зубом меньше. Я вот что скажу: синяки, ожоги, порезы — это все пустое".

languages.text: "And then the lever smacked you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts — that's just life."
languages.original_text: "И что, прям по морде тебе заехало этим рычагом? Ха! Зубом больше, зубом меньше. Синяки, ожоги, порезы — это все пустое".

traits.locale_text: "So did that lever smack you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts, hardly worth talking about."
"So did that lever smack you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts, hardly worth talking about."
"So did that lever smack you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts — hardly worth talking about."
"So did that lever smack you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts — hardly worth talking about."
"And then the lever smacked you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts — that's just life."
"And then the lever smacked you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts — that's just life."

languages.text: "Und dann ist Euch der Hebel mitten in die Fresse geknallt? Ha! Ein Zahn mehr oder weniger, das ist doch gar nichts. Blutergüsse, Verbrennungen, Schnittwunden — das gehört einfach zum Leben dazu."
languages.original_text: "And then the lever smacked you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts — that's just life."

traits.locale_text: "Und dann ist Euch der Hebel mitten in die Fresse geknallt? Ha! Ein Zahn mehr oder weniger, das ist doch gar nichts. Blutergüsse, Verbrennungen, Schnittwunden — das gehört einfach zum Leben dazu."

languages.text: «¿Y después la palanca te dio en toda la boca? ¡Ja! Diente más, diente menos, tanto da. Moratones, quemaduras, cortes... así es la vida».
languages.original_text: "And then the lever smacked you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts — that's just life."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y después la palanca te dio en toda la boca? ¡Ja! Diente más, diente menos, tanto da. Moratones, quemaduras, cortes... así es la vida».

languages.text: 「それで、レバーがお前の唇に直撃しただって？ハッ！歯の1本がなんだってんだ。打撲、やけど、切り傷…それが人生ってやつだろ」
languages.original_text: "And then the lever smacked you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts — that's just life."

traits.locale_text: 「それで、レバーがお前の唇に直撃しただって？ハッ！歯の1本がなんだってんだ。打撲、やけど、切り傷…それが人生ってやつだろ」

languages.text: “然后拉杆直接砸到你脸上了？哈！掉颗牙什么的，那都不算事！挨揍、挨烫、挨砍，这就是生活。”
languages.original_text: "And then the lever smacked you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts — that's just life."

traits.locale_text: “然后拉杆直接砸到你脸上了？哈！掉颗牙什么的，那都不算事！挨揍、挨烫、挨砍，这就是生活。”

languages.text: « Et tu t'es pris le levier en pleine tronche, c'est ça ? Ha ! Une dent de moins ou de plus, qu'est-ce que ça change, au final ? Les bleus, les brûlures, les coupures... Tout ça, ça fait partie de la vie. »
languages.original_text: "And then the lever smacked you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts — that's just life."

traits.locale_text: « Et tu t'es pris le levier en pleine tronche, c'est ça ? Ha ! Une dent de moins ou de plus, qu'est-ce que ça change, au final ? Les bleus, les brûlures, les coupures... Tout ça, ça fait partie de la vie. »

languages.text: "Sonra da kol tam ağzına vurdu, öyle mi? Hah! Dişini kaybetmeni saymazsak bu hiçbir şey. Morlukmuş, yanıkmış, kesikmiş... Hayat işte."
languages.original_text: "And then the lever smacked you right in the kisser? Hah! Give or take a tooth, this is nothing. Bruises, burns, cuts — that's just life."
